plot: The German police officer Jo Hoffman is lured into a trap during a police raid on a ship in Barcelona -- all his colleagues are shot, the cocaine is gone. Now Hoffman is wanted for murder, ...
title: In uns die Hölle
plot_es: The German police officer Jo Hoffman is lured into a trap during a police raid on a ship in Barcelona -- all his colleagues are shot, the cocaine is gone. Now Hoffman is wanted for murder, ...
